name: Spank or Pat: Heaven or Hell
name_original: Spank or Pat: Heaven or Hell
description:
All Hell and Heaven have been let loose.
All souls have mixed up and no one knows who belongs where.
It's up to you to review every soul's life and decide: to Spank or to Pat.

*Understanding english not (really) required.

Made for the EPIC Game Jam 2022 "As above so below"

Keybinds:
PC : WASD and LMB
VR : Touch, aim and trigger (for UI). Thumbsticks for rotate and teleport.

SPECS:
Ideally played in VR. 
But theres a PC build too (probably runs better too).
Decent computer required.
